{{ title }}

{{ ello }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { number = Array(8).fill(0).map((x,i)=>i); title = 'Názov projektu'; ello = true; changeProjectTitle(title: string): void { this.title = title; } checkbox(ello: boolean): void { this.ello = !ello } createRange(number: number){ return new Array(number).fill(0) .map((n, index) => index + 1); } }
